tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nihar Thakkar happens to be one of the most Proficient Endodontists I have come across. He is extremely patient and kind and very dedicated to his profession. To have the kind of knowledge and expertise at such a young age is highly commendable. Despite mine being a very complex dental issue,  Dr. Thakkar clearly seemed to understand the problems and performed my Re-Root Canal Treatment successfully.
Dr. Thakkar's Clinic is absolutely clean and spotless and his treatment impeccable!

Very professional *** ***** ************** knows his art very well and explains, comforts and treats very well. Really makes patients feel comfortable about the procedure, painless treatment. 
My entire perception of dentist has changed. I'm no more scared of them. 
Highly recommended
reply_text: Thank you so much for taking the time to write this amazing review. Looking forward forward to seeing you again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Dental Cleaning,Scaling / Polishing,
review: had little time as I flew down from overseas to do my dental treatment it was very nice of Dr Nihar to comply with my schedule to fix the appointment in advance. I am very satisfied with the treatment. He also told me everything thats going on during the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a great experience at Dr. Nihar Thakkar's clinic. During the procedure, he was supposed to give local anaesthesia and to be very frank I didn't experience excruciating pain and that was commendable. Also, during the entire surgery Dr. Nihar Thakkar and his assistant took care that I didn't have any kind of discomfort.
Also, soft soothing songs keep playing in background that makes you oblivious to the treatment.
Dr Nihar is a very intelligent *** ************* ******** he  treats patients with lot of patience… best dentist I have visited so far … would recommend him for all dental treatments.
Doctor is friendly, approachable and experienced... I had severe pain in my tooth and doctor accommodated my appointment at the very last minute. Had a very pleasant experience...
reply_text: We are glad that you liked your experience at the clinic. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

review: Dr. Nihar explains well. The ease in his skill along with his knack of dealing with intricate details makes dental treatment experience much smoother and comfortable.
